item.name: Mount Buninyong Winery
item.winemaker: Peter Armstrong, Sandra Armstrong, Robert Taylor
item.description: Mount Buninyong Winery is the venture of Peter and Jan Armstrong, assisted by son and daughter-in-law Malcolm and Sandra Armstrong. It is situated just south of Ballarat, near Scotsburn, and is planted to riesling, chardonnay, pinot noir and cabernet sauvignon. A range of table, fortified, sparkling and organic wines are made.
